Name: NCases
Description: number of case forms (values 0-8 or NA)

Name: NClass
Description: number of gender and/or inflectional classes (values 0-3 or NA)

Name: NNumber
Description: number of number distinctions (values 0-3 or NA)

Name: INT
Description: is the relative marker also used as an interrogative? - values: yes

Name: Origin
Description: what is the source of the marker in PIE?

Name: COMP
Description: is the relative marker also used as a complementizer? - values: yes

Name: Genre
Description: is the form used in spoken or written language or both? - values: spoken
